item.title: On the Construction of Relativistic Quantum Wave Equation and General Solution of the Second Order Differential Equation
item.description: arXiv:2310.17823v4 Announce Type: replace Abstract: Using the elementary axioms of special relativity and quantum mechanics we construct a wave equation which generalizes the Schrodinger equation. We also solve the general second and some higher order differential equations.
item.dc:creator: Nikolaos D. Bagis
